subtitles.xx: //[DIANA_ET]\\//(0,7)\\Good Evening 47, I have the final profile available now. Your target is TAHEIJI KOYAMA, codenamed “The Controller”. He is the final living member of the SIGMA paramilitary group, and with his elimination a particularly nasty chapter of recent history will be brought to a close. In addition to eliminating the Target, you are also to locate and acquire digital files detailing SIGMA operations during the 90s. These are likely to be located in one of the hospital’s safes. Hospital records indicate the Target suffers a rare genetic disease, but also that he has refused two full bone marrow donations on ethical grounds so far. Interesting. Clients at this particular hospital are not usually picky about where their life-extending therapy comes from. While I have confirmed that he has learned of the deaths of the other members of SIGMA, he does not seem to have altered his security arrangements or movement patterns in any meaningful way. Regardless, the hospital is highly secure, and it will be difficult to move freely, so I’ll leave you to prepare.
subtitles.en: //[DIANA_ET]\\//(5.7,8.4)\\Good Evening, 47.//(8.4,11.7)\\I have the final profile available now.//(11.7,14.3)\\Your target is Taheji Koyama,//(14.3,17.5)\\codenamed “The Controller.”//(17.5,21)\\He is the final living member of the Sigma paramilitary,//(21,25.3)\\and with his elimination, a particularly nasty chapter of recent history//(25.3,29.4)\\will be brought to a close.//(29.4,33)\\Hospital records indicate the target suffers a rare genetic disease,//(33,39.6)\\but also that he has refused two full bone marrow donations on ethical grounds so far.//(39.6,41.35)\\Interesting.//(41.35,43.3)\\Clients at this particular hospital//(43.3,49.9)\\are not usually picky about where their life-extending therapy comes from.//(49.9,53.85)\\While I have confirmed that he has learned of the deaths of the other members of Sigma,//(53.85,56.85)\\he does not seem to have altered his security arrangements//(56.85,61.7)\\or movement patterns in any meaningful way.//(61.7,64.4)\\Regardless, the hospital is highly secure,//(64.4,68.6)\\and it will be difficult to move freely.//(68.6,75.6)\\So I’ll leave you to prepare.
subtitles.fr: //[DIANA_ET]\\//(5.7,7.3)\\Bonsoir, 47.//(8.4,11.1)\\Je viens de recevoir le dernier profil.//(11.7,14.3)\\Votre cible est Taheji Koyama,//(14.3,16.6)\\nom de code "le Contrôleur".//(17.5,21)\\Il est le dernier membre du groupe paramilitaire Sigma encore en vie.//(21,27)\\Son élimination mettra un point final à un chapitre macabre de l'histoire récente.//(29.4,33)\\Les archives de l'hôpital indiquent que la cible souffre d'une maladie génétique rare,//(33,38.8)\\mais aussi qu'il a refusé deux dons de moelle épinière pour des raisons éthiques.//(39.6,40.85)\\Intéressant.//(41.35,43.3)\\Les clients de cet hôpital//(43.3,47)\\ne font généralement pas grand cas de la provenance des échantillons.//(49.9,53.85)\\Il est au courant de la mort des autres membres de Sigma,//(53.85,56.85)\\et pourtant il ne semble pas avoir modifié la sécurité//(56.85,59.5)\\autour de lui de manière significative.//(61.7,64.4)\\Quoi qu'il en soit, l'hôpital est sous haute surveillance//(64.4,67)\\et il vous sera difficile d'y évoluer librement.//(68.6,70.7)\\Je vous laisse vous préparer.
subtitles.it: //[DIANA_ET]\\//(5.7,7.6)\\Buonasera, 47.//(8.5,11.6)\\Ho ricevuto l'ultimo profilo.//(11.6,14.3)\\Il tuo bersaglio è Taheji Koyama,//(14.3,17.4)\\noto anche come "il controllore".//(17.4,20.6)\\È l'ultimo superstite del'unità paramilitare Sigma//(20.6,27)\\e con la sua eliminazione si chiuderà una parentesi particolarmente oscura della storia recente.//(29.3,33)\\I registri della clinica indicano che il bersaglio soffre di una rara malattia genetica,//(33,39.8)\\ma che ha rifiutato due donazioni di midollo osseo per motivi etici.//(39.8,41.1)\\Interessante...//(41.1,47)\\In genere i pazienti di questa clinica non si fanno scrupoli sulla provenienza di ciò che potrebbe salvargli la vita.//(50.2,53.5)\\Mi hanno confermato che è al corrente della morte degli altri membri della Sigma,//(53.5,59.5)\\ma non sembra aver modificato in alcun modo le proprie misure di sicurezza o i percorsi dei suoi spostamenti.//(61.4,64.2)\\Ciononostante, l'ospedale è ben protetto//(64.2,67)\\e sarà complicato muoversi liberamente,//(68.5,75.5)\\quindi ti lascio ai preparativi.
subtitles.de: //[DIANA_ET]\\//(6,7.3)\\Guten Abend, 47!//(8.6,10.8)\\Das letzte Profil ist jetzt verfügbar.//(11.8,16.4)\\Ihr Ziel ist Taheji Koyama, Codename „Controller“.//(17.7,22.3)\\Er ist das letzte lebende Mitglied der paramilitärischen Gruppierung SIGMA, und seine Eliminierung setzt//(22.3,27)\\einen Schlussstrich unter ein besonders ekelhaftes Kapitel der jüngeren Geschichte.//(29.6,34)\\Den Krankenhausunterlagen zufolge leidet das Ziel an einer seltenen Erbkrankheit,//(34,38.5)\\hat bislang aber aus ethischen Gründen zwei Knochenmarkspenden abgelehnt.//(40,40.8)\\Interessant.//(41.5,44.6)\\Die Patienten dieser Klinik sind üblicherweise nicht so wählerisch,//(44.6,47)\\wenn es darum geht, woher ihre lebensverlängernden Maßnahmen stammen.//(50.15,54)\\Ich konnte verifizieren, dass er über den Tod der anderen SIGMA-Mitglieder informiert ist,//(54,59)\\aber das hat ihn nicht zu einer Änderung der Sicherheitsvorkehrungen oder der Patrouillenwege veranlasst.//(61.9,64.3)\\Davon unabhängig ist das Krankenhaus selbst sehr gut gesichert,//(64.3,66.5)\\es wird also schwierig werden, sich dort frei zu bewegen.//(68.8,70.4)\\Deswegen gebe ich Ihnen jetzt Zeit zur Vorbereitung.
subtitles.es: //[DIANA_ET]\\//(5.7,7.3)\\Buenas tardes, 47.//(8.4,11.1)\\Ya tengo disponible el perfil completo.//(11.7,14.3)\\Tu objetivo es Taheji Koyama,//(14.3,16.6)\\nombre en clave "el controlador".//(17.5,21)\\Es el último miembro vivo del grupo paramilitar Sigma,//(21,25.3)\\y con su muerte, un capítulo especialmente desagradable de nuestra historia reciente//(25.3,27)\\quedará al fin cerrado.//(29.4,33)\\Los registros del hospital indican que el objetivo sufre una rara enfermedad genética,//(33,38.8)\\pero también que ha rechazado dos donaciones de médula ósea por motivos éticos.//(39.6,40.85)\\Interesante.//(41.35,43.3)\\Los clientes de este hospital concreto//(43.3,47)\\no suelen ser muy escrupulosos con el origen de las terapias que les alargan la vida.//(49.9,53.85)\\Aunque he podido confirmar que está al tanto de las muertes de los otros miembros de Sigma,//(53.85,56.85)\\no parece haber aumentado su seguridad//(56.85,59.5)\\ni modificado sus rutas de manera significativa.//(61.7,64.4)\\En cualquier caso, el hospital cuenta con mucha seguridad//(64.4,67)\\y será difícil moverse con libertad,//(68.6,70.7)\\así que dejaré que te prepares.
subtitles.ru: //[DIANA_ET]\\//(5.7,7.3)\\Добрый вечер, 47-й.//(8.4,11.1)\\Последний профиль уже доступен.//(11.7,16.6)\\Твоя цель — Тахедзи Кояма, кодовое имя «Контролер».//(17.5,21)\\Он последний член вооруженного формирования «Сигма»,//(21,27)\\и, уничтожив его, мы сможем, наконец, закрыть одну из самых мрачных глав в современной истории.//(29.4,33)\\В больничных записях говорится, что цель страдает от редкого генетического заболевания,//(33,38.8)\\однако при этом он отказался от двух полных пересадок костного мозга по этическим соображениям.//(39.6,40.85)\\Интересно.//(41.35,47)\\Пациентам этой клиники обычно все равно, откуда берется то, что продлевает им жизнь.//(49.9,53.85)\\Также я выяснила, что твоя цель, зная о смерти остальных членов «Сигмы»,//(53.85,59.5)\\отказывается усилить собственную безопасность или менять расположение своих телохранителей.//(61.7,64.4)\\Но при этом сама клиника надежно охраняется,//(64.4,67)\\что может значительно затруднить перемещение.//(68.6,75.6)\\Не буду мешать, тебе надо подготовиться.
subtitles.cn: //[DIANA_ET]\\//(5.7,8.4)\\晚上好，47。//(8.4,11.7)\\我现在上传了最后一份档案。//(11.7,17.5)\\你的目标是小山玉枝，代号为「控制者」。//(17.5,21)\\他是唯一一名尚存于世上的「西格玛」军事小队成员，//(21,29)\\只要消灭了他，我们就能为近代历史上的一段残酷无比的篇章画上句号。//(29.4,33)\\根据医院记录所显示，目标有着一种罕见的遗传疾病，//(33,39.6)\\但是，他出于道德伦理的考虑，拒绝了两次完整的骨髓捐赠。//(39.6,41.35)\\有意思。//(41.35,48.35)\\这间医院的病人，通常都不太会对他们的救命疗法过问太多。//(49.9,53.85)\\即使我确认他已经知晓了其他「西格玛」成员的死讯，//(53.85,60.85)\\但是，他似乎不打算因而改动自身的安保措施或者行动规律。//(61.7,64.4)\\无论如何，这间医院戒备森严，安保严密，//(64.4,68.6)\\在此地，你将遇到各种的掣肘，难以自由行动。//(68.6,75.6)\\我就不打扰你准备了。
subtitles.tc: //[DIANA_ET]\\//(5.7,8.4)\\晚安，47。//(8.4,11.7)\\我現在有了最後一份檔案。//(11.7,17.5)\\你的目標是小山玉枝，代號為「控制者」。//(17.5,21)\\他是唯一一名尚存於世上的「西格馬」准軍式組織成員，//(21,29)\\在消滅了他以後，近代歷史上的這段特別腐敗的章節也將告一個段落。//(29.4,33)\\根據醫院記錄所顯示，目標患有一種罕見的基因病變，//(33,39.6)\\不過，他出於道德倫理的考慮，拒絕了兩次完整的骨髓捐贈。//(39.6,41.35)\\有意思。//(41.35,48.35)\\這間醫院的客戶一般都不太在意，能延續他們的療程從何而來。//(49.9,53.85)\\即使我確定他已經收到其他「西格馬」成員的死訊，//(53.85,60.85)\\但是，他似乎不打算因而改變自身的保全安排或是生活作息。//(61.7,64.4)\\無論如何，這間醫院戒備森嚴，保全嚴密，//(64.4,68.6)\\而且，你將遇到各種的掣肘，難以自由行動。//(68.6,75.6)\\你先去做好準備。
subtitles.jp: //[DIANA_ET]\\//(5.5,8.3)\\こんばんは 47//(8.3,11.3)\\最後の1人の情報が入ったわ//(11.3,14.3)\\ターゲットはタヘイジ・コヤマ//(14.3,17.2)\\コードネームは「コントローラー」よ//(17.2,20.4)\\彼は民兵組織SIGMAの最後の生き残りで//(20.4,22)\\彼を始末することで//(22,27.8)\\近代史における最もおぞましい歴史のひとつに終止符が打たれることになるわ//(27.8,30.3)\\病院の記録によるとターゲットは//(30.3,33.9)\\珍しい遺伝的疾患を患っているそうよ//(33.9,40.9)\\ただし倫理的な理由から骨髄の提供を過去に2件断っているらしいわ//(41,45.3)\\この病院の他の患者は臓器の出所を気にしたりしないから//(45.3,48.1)\\興味深い対応と言えるわね//(50.1,54.2)\\彼はSIGMAのほかのメンバーの死について知っているようだけど//(54.2,58.8)\\特に自分の警護体制や移動パターンを変えたりはしていないようね//(61.4,65)\\とはいえ病院は厳重に警備されているから//(65,68.7)\\行動するのは簡単ではないはず//(68.7,71)\\準備は一任するわ
